com.linecorp.armeria.client.retry

Interface RetryStrategy<I extends Request,O extends Response>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - the request type
    O - the response type
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface RetryStrategy<I extends Request,O extends Response>
    Determines whether a failed request should be retried.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Backoff defaultBackoff 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <I extends Request,O extends Response>
      RetryStrategy<I,O>      		 never()
      A RetryStrategy that defines a retry should not be performed.
      static RetryStrategy<HttpRequest,HttpResponse> onServerErrorStatus()
      Returns the RetryStrategy that retries the request with the defaultBackoff when the response matches HttpStatusClass.SERVER_ERROR.
      static RetryStrategy<HttpRequest,HttpResponse> onServerErrorStatus(Backoff backoff)
      Returns the RetryStrategy that retries the request with the specified backoff when the response matches HttpStatusClass.SERVER_ERROR.
      static RetryStrategy<HttpRequest,HttpResponse> onStatus(Function<HttpStatus,Optional<Backoff>> statusBasedBackoffFunction)
      Returns the RetryStrategy that decides to retry the request using statusBasedBackoffFunction.
      CompletableFuture<Optional<Backoff>> shouldRetry(I request, O response)
      Returns CompletableFuture with Optional that contains Backoff which will be used for retry.

    • Field Detail

      • defaultBackoff

        static final Backoff defaultBackoff

    • Method Detail

      • never

        static <I extends Request,O extends Response> RetryStrategy<I,O> never()
        A RetryStrategy that defines a retry should not be performed.

      • onServerErrorStatus

        static RetryStrategy<HttpRequest,HttpResponse> onServerErrorStatus()
        Returns the RetryStrategy that retries the request with the defaultBackoff when the response matches HttpStatusClass.SERVER_ERROR.

      • onServerErrorStatus

        static RetryStrategy<HttpRequest,HttpResponse> onServerErrorStatus(Backoff backoff)
        Returns the RetryStrategy that retries the request with the specified backoff when the response matches HttpStatusClass.SERVER_ERROR.

      • onStatus

        static RetryStrategy<HttpRequest,HttpResponse> onStatus(Function<HttpStatus,Optional<Backoff>> statusBasedBackoffFunction)
        Returns the RetryStrategy that decides to retry the request using statusBasedBackoffFunction.
        Parameters:
        statusBasedBackoffFunction - the Function that returns Optional<Backoff> according to the HttpStatus

      • shouldRetry

        CompletableFuture<Optional<Backoff>> shouldRetry(I request,
                                                 O response)
        Returns CompletableFuture with Optional that contains Backoff which will be used for retry. If the condition does not match, this needs to return Optional.empty() to stop retry attempt. Note that ResponseTimeoutException is not retriable for the whole retry, but each attempt.
        See Also:
        RetryingClientBuilder.responseTimeoutMillisForEachAttempt(long)
